thread.section_title: Lanzerac Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful!
thread.title_full: Wonderful! - Review of Lanzerac Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: No1Scribbler
title: Wonderful!
text:
We've just had a really relaxing and enjoyable stay at Lanzerac.
The staff are superb in all areas, we especially enjoyed the service we received in the restaurants and Sem our bartender was a true professional!
We enjoyed the deli, wine tasting and cellar tour, the pools were superb as was the spa.
Our accommodation was beautiful and we loved the antiques that adorned every room.
A truly wonderful place, I can't wait to go back!
See all photos
